Module nl.naturalis.common
Package nl.naturalis.common.io

Class ZipFileSwapOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • nl.naturalis.common.io.RecallOutputStream
        • nl.naturalis.common.io.SwapOutputStream
          • nl.naturalis.common.io.FileSwapOutputStream
            • nl.naturalis.common.io.ZipFileSwapOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable
    public class ZipFileSwapOutputStream
extends FileSwapOutputStream
    A subclass of SwapOutputStream that swaps to file once its internal buffer overflows. Data is compressed as it is written to an internal buffer, thereby decreasing the chance that the internal buffer will have to be swapped out to file. This class combines the functionality of DeflaterOutputStream and BufferedOutputStream. Therefore you don't anything from wrapping a ZipFileSwapOutputStream into a BufferedOutputStream.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZipFileSwapOutputStream

        public ZipFileSwapOutputStream​(File swapFile)
        Creates a SwapOutputStream with an internal buffer of treshold bytes, swapping to the specified resource once the buffer overflows. Data entering the ZipFileSwapOutputStream is compressed using the default compression level.
        Parameters:
        swapFile - A Supplier of the swap-to outputstream.

      • ZipFileSwapOutputStream

        public ZipFileSwapOutputStream​(File swapFile,
                               int bufSize)
        Creates a SwapOutputStream with an internal buffer of treshold bytes, swapping to the specified resource once the buffer overflows. Data entering the ZipFileSwapOutputStream is compressed using the default compression level.
        Parameters:
        swapFile - A Supplier of the swap-to outputstream.
        bufSize - The size in bytes of the internal buffer

      • ZipFileSwapOutputStream

        public ZipFileSwapOutputStream​(File swapFile,
                               int bufSize,
                               int compressionLevel)
        Creates a ZipFileSwapOutputStream with an internal buffer of treshold bytes, swapping to the specified resource once the buffer overflows.
        Parameters:
        swapFile - A Supplier of the swap-to outputstream.
        bufSize - The size in bytes of the internal buffer
        compressionLevel - The compression level (0-9)

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Closes the ZipFileSwapOutputStream and releases all resources held by it. You cannot re-use a ZipFileSwapOutputStream once you have called this method.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:

        Overrides:
        close in class SwapOutputStream
        Throws:
        IOException

      • closeSession

        public void closeSession()
                  throws IOException
        Compresseses any remaining data and, if open, closes the swap-to output stream. Because the swap-to output stream is lazily instantiated via a ThrowingSupplier, a SwapOutputStream can safely be re-used after this method has been called. A subsequent write action will simply cause the swap-to output stream to be retrieved again from the supplier.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs
